data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is intended to allow an easy implementation of the
    google gmail's notifier within any application, simply by creating
    the object and calling its methods. As far as, I know, there is no
    (yet) other module providing this functionnality. As it is an
    application that checks emails through secure pop, it is obvious
    that it goes under the Mail:: tree, it is strictly related to GMail
    so it should follow that branch, Notifier is an explicit name for
    what it does, hence the choice of the namespace
    Mail::GMail::Notifier.
